DirectedGraphBuilderUtils

Static utility methods for directed graph building.

Functions
CompileNodeIdMap
public static DictionaryNodeIdMap CompileNodeIdMap(
int inputOutputCount,
int[] hiddenNodeIdArr
)

Create an INodeIdMap that provides a mapping from old to new node IDs.

Parameters
inputOutputCount
int

The total number of input and output nodes (input and output node IDs remain unchanged, i.e. are mapped with the identity mapping).

hiddenNodeIdArr
int[]

An array of hidden node IDs.

Returns

A new instance of DictionaryNodeIdMap.
